typeProperties.script:
source(output(
		id as integer,
		name as string,
		host_id as integer,
		host_name as string,
		neighbourhood_group as string,
		neighbourhood as string,
		latitude as double,
		longitude as double,
		room_type as string,
		price as float,
		minimum_nights as integer,
		number_of_reviews as integer,
		last_review as date 'MM/dd/yyyy',
		reviews_per_month as float,
		calculated_host_listings_count as integer,
		availability_365 as integer
	),
	allowSchemaDrift: true,
	validateSchema: false,
	ignoreNoFilesFound: false) ~> ReadAirbnbData
ReadAirbnbData derive(name_clean = regexReplace(name, '[^A-Za-z0-9 ]|(  +)', ''),
		host_name_clean = regexReplace(name, '[^A-Za-z ]|(  +)', ''),
		neighborhood_clean = regexReplace(neighbourhood, '[^A-Za-z0-9 ]|(  +)', ''),
		room_type_clean = regexReplace(room_type, '[^A-Za-z0-9 ]|(  +)', '')) ~> CleanNameHostNameNeighborRoomType
CleanNameHostNameNeighborRoomType aggregate(groupBy(id),
	Count = count(id)) ~> RowCountForId
RowCountForId filter(Count>1) ~> GetDuplicates
GetDuplicates, ReadAirbnbData join(RowCountForId@id == ReadAirbnbData@id,
	joinType:'inner',
	broadcast: 'auto')~> JoinRawColumns
JoinRawColumns derive(issue = concat('duplicates. (', toString(Count), ') times')) ~> AppendDuplicateDataIssue
AppendDuplicateDataIssue select(mapColumn(
		id = ReadAirbnbData@id,
		name,
		host_id,
		host_name,
		neighbourhood_group,
		neighbourhood,
		latitude,
		longitude,
		room_type,
		price,
		minimum_nights,
		number_of_reviews,
		last_review,
		reviews_per_month,
		calculated_host_listings_count,
		availability_365,
		issue
	),
	skipDuplicateMapInputs: true,
	skipDuplicateMapOutputs: true) ~> Select1
CleanNameHostNameNeighborRoomType window(over(id),
	asc(id, true),
	Rank = denseRank()) ~> RankData
RankData filter(Rank==1) ~> FilterForUniqueData
FilterForUniqueData split(isNull(name_clean) || name_clean=='',
	isNull(host_name_clean) || host_name_clean=='',
	isNull(neighborhood_clean) || neighborhood_clean=='',
	isNull(room_type_clean) || room_type_clean=='',
	isNull(price) || price<=0,
	isNull(availability_365) || availability_365<=0,
	disjoint: false) ~> SplitDataIssue@(MissingNames, MissingHostNames, MissingNeighborthood, MissingRoomType, InvalidPrice, InvalidAvailability, Valid)
SplitDataIssue@MissingNames derive(issue = 'missing name') ~> AppendMissingNamesIssue
AppendMissingNamesIssue select(mapColumn(
		id,
		name,
		host_id,
		host_name,
		neighbourhood_group,
		neighbourhood,
		latitude,
		longitude,
		room_type,
		price,
		minimum_nights,
		number_of_reviews,
		last_review,
		reviews_per_month,
		calculated_host_listings_count,
		availability_365,
		issue
	),
	skipDuplicateMapInputs: true,
	skipDuplicateMapOutputs: true) ~> Select2
SplitDataIssue@MissingHostNames derive(issue = 'missing host name') ~> AppendMissingHostNames
AppendMissingHostNames select(mapColumn(
		id,
		name,
		host_id,
		host_name,
		neighbourhood_group,
		neighbourhood,
		latitude,
		longitude,
		room_type,
		price,
		minimum_nights,
		number_of_reviews,
		last_review,
		reviews_per_month,
		calculated_host_listings_count,
		availability_365,
		issue
	),
	skipDuplicateMapInputs: true,
	skipDuplicateMapOutputs: true) ~> Select3
SplitDataIssue@MissingNeighborthood derive(issue = 'missing neighborhood') ~> AppendMissingNeighborhood
AppendMissingNeighborhood select(mapColumn(
		id,
		name,
		host_id,
		host_name,
		neighbourhood_group,
		neighbourhood,
		latitude,
		longitude,
		room_type,
		price,
		minimum_nights,
		number_of_reviews,
		last_review,
		reviews_per_month,
		calculated_host_listings_count,
		availability_365,
		issue
	),
	skipDuplicateMapInputs: true,
	skipDuplicateMapOutputs: true) ~> Select4
SplitDataIssue@MissingRoomType derive(issue = 'mssing room type') ~> AppendMissingRoomType
AppendMissingRoomType select(mapColumn(
		id,
		name,
		host_id,
		host_name,
		neighbourhood_group,
		neighbourhood,
		latitude,
		longitude,
		room_type,
		price,
		minimum_nights,
		number_of_reviews,
		last_review,
		reviews_per_month,
		calculated_host_listings_count,
		availability_365,
		issue
	),
	skipDuplicateMapInputs: true,
	skipDuplicateMapOutputs: true) ~> Select5
SplitDataIssue@InvalidPrice derive(issue = 'invalid price') ~> AppendInvalidPriceIssue
AppendInvalidPriceIssue select(mapColumn(
		id,
		name,
		host_id,
		host_name,
		neighbourhood_group,
		neighbourhood,
		latitude,
		longitude,
		room_type,
		price,
		minimum_nights,
		number_of_reviews,
		last_review,
		reviews_per_month,
		calculated_host_listings_count,
		availability_365,
		issue
	),
	skipDuplicateMapInputs: true,
	skipDuplicateMapOutputs: true) ~> Select6
SplitDataIssue@InvalidAvailability derive(issue = 'invalid availability') ~> InvalidAvailability
InvalidAvailability select(mapColumn(
		id,
		name,
		host_id,
		host_name,
		neighbourhood_group,
		neighbourhood,
		latitude,
		longitude,
		room_type,
		price,
		minimum_nights,
		number_of_reviews,
		last_review,
		reviews_per_month,
		calculated_host_listings_count,
		availability_365,
		issue
	),
	skipDuplicateMapInputs: true,
	skipDuplicateMapOutputs: true) ~> Select7
Select1 sink(allowSchemaDrift: true,
	validateSchema: false,
	deletable:false,
	insertable:true,
	updateable:false,
	upsertable:false,
	format: 'table',
	skipDuplicateMapInputs: true,
	skipDuplicateMapOutputs: true,
	errorHandlingOption: 'stopOnFirstError') ~> WriteDuplicateData
Select2 sink(allowSchemaDrift: true,
	validateSchema: false,
	deletable:false,
	insertable:true,
	updateable:false,
	upsertable:false,
	format: 'table',
	skipDuplicateMapInputs: true,
	skipDuplicateMapOutputs: true,
	errorHandlingOption: 'stopOnFirstError') ~> WriteMissingNameRows
Select3 sink(allowSchemaDrift: true,
	validateSchema: false,
	deletable:false,
	insertable:true,
	updateable:false,
	upsertable:false,
	format: 'table',
	skipDuplicateMapInputs: true,
	skipDuplicateMapOutputs: true,
	errorHandlingOption: 'stopOnFirstError') ~> WriteMissingHostNames
Select4 sink(allowSchemaDrift: true,
	validateSchema: false,
	deletable:false,
	insertable:true,
	updateable:false,
	upsertable:false,
	format: 'table',
	skipDuplicateMapInputs: true,
	skipDuplicateMapOutputs: true,
	errorHandlingOption: 'stopOnFirstError') ~> WriteMissingNeighborhood
Select5 sink(allowSchemaDrift: true,
	validateSchema: false,
	deletable:false,
	insertable:true,
	updateable:false,
	upsertable:false,
	format: 'table',
	skipDuplicateMapInputs: true,
	skipDuplicateMapOutputs: true,
	errorHandlingOption: 'stopOnFirstError') ~> WriteMissingRoomType
Select6 sink(allowSchemaDrift: true,
	validateSchema: false,
	deletable:false,
	insertable:true,
	updateable:false,
	upsertable:false,
	format: 'table',
	skipDuplicateMapInputs: true,
	skipDuplicateMapOutputs: true,
	errorHandlingOption: 'stopOnFirstError') ~> WriteInvalidPrice
Select7 sink(allowSchemaDrift: true,
	validateSchema: false,
	deletable:false,
	insertable:true,
	updateable:false,
	upsertable:false,
	format: 'table',
	skipDuplicateMapInputs: true,
	skipDuplicateMapOutputs: true,
	errorHandlingOption: 'stopOnFirstError') ~> WriteInvalidAvailability
